<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update the Resources Scan Config</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/config/v3/resource/configure"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns the resource scan configs for those that have been updated.

## Request

qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"scanType"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:**
